source_objects.title: Business Strategy
source_objects.description: Become a master strategist with courses on the following: business strategy, performance innovation, marketing strategy, customer loyalty and more.

Apply Brainstorming To Any Part Of Your Life And Business
Make Tough Decisions With Ease

objectives_summary: How to learn Informed, intentional and compelling decision making process.

items.title: How to Solve Problems Like Top Business Consultants

visible_instructors.title: Luke Chen, MD
visible_instructors.name: Luke
visible_instructors.job_title: Ex MBB | Ex Startup | Digital Marketer | Entrepreneur

items.headline: Solve business problems using the approach of top management consulting firms like McKinsey, BCG, and Bain
objectives_summary: You'll learn how to tackle challenging business problems and impress your managers/ clients like the world's top management consultants
You'll master the key frameworks and approaches of hypothesis-driven problem-solving (e.g., issue tree, 4C framework)
You'll learn how to deliver presentations and messages persuasively to C-level executives and potential investors or clients

items.title: Business Planning

visible_instructors.job_title: Founder & CEO of Painless Financial Training Group Inc.

items.headline: Effective Methods For Achieving  Your Business Goals
objectives_summary: Set meaningful and realistic goals that are achievable
You will establish the vision for your business and determine how close to that vision you plan to be by the end of the year.
You will determine the best strategies to be employed to achieve your business goals by selecting from lists of proven business profitability strategies.
